702565f.title: Brooklyn: 15th Street (West) - Bowery
702565f.text:
(1)
West 15th Street, at the S.E. corner of Bowery. (Coney Island).
A view of the Irish Center.
July 4, 1936.
P. L. Sperr.
(2)
Another view of No. 1, showing the Irish House on the Bowery.
July 4, 1936.
P. L. Sperr.

703275f-a.title: Brooklyn: Bowery - 15th Street
703275f-a.text:
Bowery, east of West 15th Street. (Coney Island).
July 4, 1936.
P. L. Sperr.
